definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">On player tick update</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/scoreboard objectives add ispcb dummy</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/scoreboard players set @e[type=item] ispcb 1 {Item:{id:"tut:unpreppedpcb",Count:1b}}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/execute @e[score_ispcb_min=1] ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~ ~ tut:acid 0 /entitydata @e[type=item] {Item:{id:"tut:etchedpcb",Count:1b}}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
